title: Aasimar
entryLore: Aasimar are mortals who carry a spark of the Upper Planes within their souls. Whether descended from a celestial being or infused with heavenly power, they possess divine traits that reflect their angelic heritage. They can unleash the fury of the heavens to protect the innocent, manifesting their inner light as a transformative power on the battlefield.

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.description: You have [[resistance|Resistance]] to [[necrotic_damage|Necrotic damage]] and [[radiant_damage|Radiant damage]].

traits.name: Healing Hands
traits.description: As an [[action|Action]], you can touch a creature and roll a number of d4s equal to your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]]. The creature regains a number of Hit Points equal to the total rolled. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].

traits.name: Light Bearer
traits.description: You know the [[light|Light]] cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Celestial Revelation
traits.description: Starting at 3rd level, you can use a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]] to unleash a celestial transformation. Choose one of the following options: **Necrotic Shroud**, **Radiant Consumption**, or **Radiant Soul**. The transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].
